typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> AzureBlobStorageSecFilings
AzureBlobStorageSecFilings select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name != 'size')),
		each(match(name != 'last_modified_iso')),
		each(match(name != 'last_modified_timestamp')),
		each(match(name == 'name'),
			'file_name' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateAndNullColumns
